title: The Sinner
description: A New York Times BestsellerIn the chapel of Our Lady of Divine Light two nuns lie in a pool of blood - one dead, one critically injured - victims of a savage attacker. Maura Isles's autopsy of the dead woman reveals that she was murdered. When another woman is found mutilated beyond recognition, the case takes a stunning new turn and Maura finds herself drawn toward a dawning revelation about the killer's identity too shattering to consider.
author: Tess Gerritsen
